channel.title: My fancy blog
channel.description: A blog about turtles and carrots

item.title: Once upon a time at school.
item.description:
The narrative gets switched back and forth between the past that takes place in the Enchanted Forest and the present that takes place in Storybrooke, and the truth is soon revealed: the Evil Queen won, and (most of) the citizens of the Enchanted Forest now suffer Laser-Guided Amnesia in Storybrooke. Emma — who is revealed to be the daughter of Snow White and Prince Charming — is the only hope they have of restoring their happy endings and breaking the curse on Storybrooke. Much of the first season focuses on Henry trying to convince Emma that the curse is real, while Regina tries her best to prevent Emma from finding the truth. At the same time, we learn more about the citizens of Storybrooke and their Enchanted Forest counterparts.

Tags: AI
item.dc:creator: 8bit Donkey
